name: Archero (Clone)
description:
This is just a clone for my school project

GROUP INFORMATION

  • Group Name : 500
  • Members:
    • Nguyễn Nam Hoàng Long
    • Trần Đăng Khoa
    • Trần Nhĩ Hào
    • Đào Hữu Đức

INFOMRATION

  • A 2D Topdown Roguelike game about a survivor defense himself from enemies
  • Built with Unity 2021.3.2f1

RULES

  • Your character will begin with 100 HP
  • You will lose if your character lose all HP.
  • Try to get highscore.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Move using WASD
  • Level up by killing enemies.
  • For every 5 level, you can upgrade your skills.
  • Enemies will be faster and stronger overtime.
